reviews.review_msg: I really enjoyed having Dr. Knowler as my prof for REM 200. He is very knowledgable and I feel that I have learned a lot. My only qualm is that the course is weighted heavily on the back-end, meaning we have yet to receive 70% of the course grade, so that's rather stressful. Otherwise, he's a great prof and I recommend taking a class with him.

The concept of the class was to know the aspects of environmental management, analyze, and make commentary. We had 2 papers, 1 group presentation and 1 final. Just memorizing concepts is not enough, prof checks if you can actually make conclusions from these concepts and real-life examples. He knows what he s talking about. Very smart prof.
This class has a lot of writing, but he marks like it is a W class. The lectures are good, but the written assignment are hard. I don't understand why. The TA marks like a robot.
